original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1246)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(826)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對前方直線範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，並在地上留下火焰。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1246)@</color>to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(826)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage on the enemy in a straight line ahead and leaves flames on the ground.
